Articles.Content:
How long will it take you to figure out why?

I tried 3 times to complete a simple contract. It was only on the 4th try that I figured out what was wrong.

How long will it take you to figure out why?

Looks good to me, it'll only take about 180 m/sec-and-change of delta-v for you to eject towards MINMUS~
LOL 2 seconds, mostly the load time of the picture, I seen the issue and laughed....with you of course.
Hahaha! Imagine the look on Jebediah's face when mission control breaks the news...

I thought it was going to be a satellite in the right orbit but going the wrong way, lots of people have done that. This though is a new one!

As Renegrade says, a Mun-Minmus transfer won't require much delta-V, though you will need to get the right timing.
That's too bad you can't just accept a new Mun contract and give them a "like-new station".

hehehehe.

Be happy.

Yesterday I started a new career, put Jeb in the pod strapped to a small SRB and a chute with the simple and easy missions of "launch a new vessel" and "reach 5000m". I pressed space. My chute and rocket started at the same time.

hehehehe.

Be happy.

Yesterday I started a new career, put Jeb in the pod strapped to a small SRB and a chute with the simple and easy missions of "launch a new vessel" and "reach 5000m". I pressed space. My chute and rocket started at the same time.

if it makes you feel any better: that mistake has actually happened in real life as well. There's a video about it on the forums somewhere.

Lol, took me a moment to figure that out, was looking for a target orbit

And yeah, the chute-booster-stage is about the most annoying thing in the VAB... There's just no state I can imagine where they should ever be on the same stage as any kind of propulsion, with the possible exception of separatrons if you're using a stage recovery mod. Second most annoying is launch clamps going into a new stage before your rocket fires. Release drop panic spacebar-spacebar-spacebar-spacebar-explode.

Second most annoying is launch clamps going into a new stage before your rocket fires. Release drop panic spacebar-spacebar-spacebar-spacebar-explode.

so. many. times. I cannot begin to count.
